genresAdvancedInfo.name: alabama hardcore
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Alabama Hardcore is a subgenre of hardcore punk music that originated in the southern United States. It is characterized by its fast and aggressive sound, with lyrics often dealing with political and social issues. The music is typically loud, with distorted guitars and heavy drums.
